{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15937v1", "title": "Intermediate modular curves with infinitely many quartic points", "summary": "For every group $\{\pm1\}\subseteq \Delta\subseteq (\mathbb Z/N\mathbb
Z)^\times$, there exists an intermediate modular curve $X_\Delta(N)$. In this
paper we determine all curves $X_\Delta(N)$ with infinitely many points of
degree $4$ over $\mathbb Q$. To do that, we developed a method to compute
possible degrees of rational morphisms from $X_\Delta(N)$ to an elliptic curve.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-22T14:27:12Z"}
